memberdef.argsstring: (std::string checkpoint_dir, int checkpoint_epochs, int checkpoint_steps, int checkpoint_secs, bool checkpoint_per_rank)
memberdef.name: lbann_callback_checkpoint

parameterdescription.para: true to save/load a file per mpi rank

detaileddescription.para: Called once to set up the callback (after all layers are set up).
Called immediate after the end of each epoch.
Called immediately after the end of a (mini-)batch.
Called immediately after the end of validation.

listitem.para: Checkpoint at given interval in given directory
